app.description: A Zendesk app that shows a list of tickets that have the same Custom Field value as the current ticket being viewed.
app.name: Related Tickets by Custom Field

custom_field_id.label: ID of the custom field to be used to get related tickets. Get Custom Field Id for the custom field you want the app to use. You can get the ID from your Zendesk Support -> Admin Home -> Ticket Fileds -> Field -> Edit

fetch.fail: failed to fetch information from the server
